text: Hengconarius is a genus of funnel weavers first described by Zhao & S. Q. Li in 2018. ==Species== it contains eight species: *Hengconarius dedaensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Hengconarius exilis (Zhang, Zhu & Wang, 2005) — China *Hengconarius falcatus (Xu & Li, 2006) — China *Hengconarius incertus (Wang, 2003) — China *Hengconarius latusincertus (Wang, Griswold & Miller, 2010) — China *Hengconarius longipalpus Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Hengconarius longpuensis Zhao & S. Q. Li, 2018 — China *Hengconarius pseudobrunneus (Wang, 2003) — China ==References== ==External links== Category:Agelenidae Category:Araneomorphae genera
title: Hengconarius
